divs: Sighting Details While camping in brown county forest my wife and Iobserved a Star like object that was NOT in the hieght of normal stars and NOTin the altitude of any aircraft.The Star moved north to south at what appearedto be the speed of a slow moving propeller driven aircraft if it were at normalaltitude.This object was NOT an aircraft or a Star.This object was NOT in ouratmosphere.This object was in outer orbit above any normal aircraft range(including milatry).My question if you can answer is, could this have been aSatallite? (are they as bright as stars) or manmade craft? i.e,Spaceshuttle,rocket,etc?I am VERY concerend about this and would like a reply(good or bad) as I KNOW this was not like anything I or my wife have observed insky the past.Please respond. Sincere, William and Allison Warner
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around July 22nd 2002
